content: We all have fingerprints however they are unique, even identical twins have different fingerprints. This was known recently, however this was portrayed in the Quran 1400 years before it was discovered.The Quran says that on Resurrection Day Allah will recreate humans with all details even their fingertips. Today we know that those fingertips contain fingerprints which are unique to each individual.
Yes indeed; We are Able to reconstruct his fingertips.
content_ar: ٤ بَلَىٰ قَادِرِينَ عَلَىٰ أَنْ نُسَوِّيَ بَنَانَهُ

content: On Resurrection Day Allah will reconstruct our bodies to the smallest detail even our fingertips.
How could an illiterate man who lived 1400 years ago have known that fingertips have something unique?
